text: han 6 centimeters.               and cancer has spread to any of the following:               - The nasal cavity.      - The ethmoid sinus.      - The eye socket.      - The maxillary sinus.      - The roof of the mouth.      - The bone between the eyes.               or      Cancer has spread to any of the following:                - The front of the eye.      - The skin of the nose or cheek.      - Front parts of the skull.      - The base of the skull.      - The sphenoid or frontal sinuses.
